idea:
smeDEALZ.com is a technology based B2B portal that provides a complete ecosystem for the growth and development of SMEs in India. Major support systems provided smeDEALZ include Inorganic expansion through business acquisitions, Intellectual Property acquisitions (first time ever in India), Exit option for investors in SMEs through spot sale of unlisted securities, Franchise arrangements, Enlisting of a host of service providers and professionals for every need of an SME, Capitalisation through PE and VC funds and private investors, and Debt funding through Banks, SFBs, Coop Banks, NBFC etc. True to its tagline, it’s a BUSINESS BAZAAR!

 

Why smeDEALZ is called an ecosystem? Several SME businesses have great potential to hit high growth trajectories. Inorganic growth by way of business mergers and acquisitions enables both forward and backward integrations. This may require funding in the form of debt or equity. Similarly, several start-ups have huge upside due to inherent technology and disruptive business models. The full strength of these bootstrapped start-ups could be commercialised if timely start-up finance by way of angel funding is made available. Many SMEs seek geographical presence through Franchise set up also. On the other hand, many SMEs and Start-ups, due to inherent issues like absence of heirship, inadequate financial resources, obsolescence, and other factors, would like to sell their businesses to potential buyers who are on an expansion mode. The Intellectual properties held by such SMEs may also be available for sale.  smeDEALZ facilitates all the aforesaid transactions

 

All these transactions require the assistance of business consultancy firms including merchant bankers, investment bankers, valuation firms, law firms, taxation firms and above all chartered accountants and company secretaries. smeDEALZ this acts as a business integrator and a digital investment banker facilitating start-up finance, SME finance and business consultancy under one roof. Apart from unlocking the value, smeDEALZ enables revival of ailing businesses thereby strengthening, on a continuous basis, the country’s economy. MAKE-IN-INDIA, START-UP INDIA and ATMANIRBHAR BHARAT programs are thereby made more robust and sustainable by smeDEALZ.
name: FINTEGLAW BUSINESS INTEGRATORS PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: Our company is among the leading furniture manufacturers in India, offers a brilliant range of products in multiple furniture catalogues. With our quality products, fast delivery & prompt service we aim to become the trusted choice in home and office furniture.
name: BIG BOX FURNITURE LLP

idea:
Engaged in Marketing of Cosmetics, driven by an IIM Alumnus with 8 years of experience across pharma, Packaged goods, Ecommerce, Social Media & Broadcast Media. This startup has the vision of bringing value to Beauty Industry consumers, by reducing the cost to serve while focused on an outcome based approach.

The venture believes in mastering niches as that is the direction the beauty industry is headed in the current digital age, with consumers having easy access to information on solutions, ingredients & options, and going for only the best specialised solution for individual beauty use case they want to solve for.
name: NC

idea:
Please find below brief of our company,


We are one of the most reputed and renowned name in the field of


 textiles, with specialty being designing and creating of contemporary


 fabrics, hard to find elsewhere.


 


  We specialize in : -


 


* Digital and Rotary prints on Cotton / Rayon / Modal 


 * Cotton fabrics for Men's, Ladies Fashion, Kids & Crafts.


 * Yarn dyed Men's shirting fabrics.


 * Plain Dyeds in 100% Cotton and Giza yarns


 * Bottom Weights in Cottons 


 


 


 We have independent verticals to manufacture various fabrics and have


 an in-house team of dedicated designers for creating in-vogue designs


 backed by robust operations channel to handle the production, quality


 check and delivery process efficiently.


 


We have a setup of Echinos printing machine and different base fabrics to print on with state of art technology printing factory 


 


 We offer


 


 "MULTI-PRODUCT / HIGH QUALITY FABRICS AT COMPETITIVE PRICES"


 


 It would be an honor to be associated with you and we would request


 you to give us an opportunity to serve you.


 


 Looking forward to start our new relations
name: EUROPIANA FABRICA LLP
